actor_awards.notes: Renowned for his role as Klaatu in the 1951 sci-fi classic 'The Day the Earth Stood Still'.

filmography.title: Trio
filmography.role_description: A British major in a sanatorium who forms a bond with a fellow patient in this Somerset Maugham anthology.
filmography.plot: An anthology of three stories by W. Somerset Maugham, featuring tales of a verger, a ship's bore, and a sanatorium romance.

filmography.title: The Black Rose
filmography.role_description: The imposing King of England whose tyranny drives the protagonist to seek his fortune in the Far East.
filmography.plot: A 13th-century Saxon nobleman travels to China to escape Norman rule and find his fortune.

filmography.title: The 13th Letter
filmography.role_description: A doctor in a small Canadian town who becomes the target of a poison pen letter writer.
filmography.plot: Residents of a small Quebec town begin receiving poison pen letters, leading to suspicion and tragedy.

filmography.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
filmography.role_description: A humanoid alien visitor who arrives on Earth with a robot and a warning for humanity to live in peace or be destroyed.
filmography.plot: An alien lands on Earth and tells the people of the world that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Film Promoting International Understanding

filmography.title: I'll Never Forget You
filmography.role_description: A colleague of an American scientist who travels back in time to 18th-century London.
filmography.plot: An American scientist transports himself back to 1784 London, where he falls in love but faces the complications of the past.

filmography.title: Phone Call from a Stranger
filmography.role_description: A guilt-ridden doctor who perishes in a plane crash, prompting a survivor to visit his widow.
filmography.plot: The survivor of a plane crash visits the families of his fellow passengers to comfort them and learn about their lives.

filmography.title: 5 Fingers
filmography.role_description: A British agent who investigates a security leak at the British embassy in Turkey during WWII.
filmography.plot: A valet sells secrets to the Germans during WWII, not out of ideology, but to realize his dream of becoming a gentleman.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Director; Golden Globe: Win – Best Screenplay

filmography.title: Les Misérables
filmography.role_description: The ex-convict who seeks redemption and tries to outrun his past in this adaptation of Victor Hugo's classic.
filmography.plot: In 19th-century France, a paroled convict seeks redemption while being pursued by a ruthless police inspector.

filmography.title: Sailor of the King
filmography.role_description: A British naval officer who has a brief romance during WWI, unknowingly fathering a hero of the next war.
filmography.plot: During WWII, a Canadian signalman is the sole survivor of a German attack on his ship and must survive on a desolate island.

filmography.title: Dangerous Crossing
filmography.role_description: The ship's doctor who helps a woman whose husband has mysteriously disappeared during a cruise.
filmography.plot: A newlywed wife on a cruise ship is terrified when her husband vanishes and no one believes he ever existed.

filmography.title: The Robe
filmography.role_description: The disciple Simon Peter, who guides the Roman tribune Marcellus toward Christianity.
filmography.plot: In the Roman province of Judea, a Roman tribune commands the unit that crucifies Jesus, but he is forever changed by the experience.

filmography.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
filmography.role_description: Reprising his role as the apostle Peter, who tries to protect the robe of Christ from the mad Emperor Caligula.
filmography.plot: A Christian slave is sentenced to the arena, where his faith is tested by the brutality of the games and the seduction of Messalina.

filmography.title: Princess of the Nile
filmography.role_description: A Bedouin chief who allies with an Egyptian princess to fight against a tyrant.
filmography.plot: An Egyptian princess leads a double life as a dancer to organize a rebellion against a usurper.

filmography.title: Désirée
filmography.role_description: The French marshal who marries Napoleon's first love and eventually becomes the King of Sweden.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between Napoleon Bonaparte and Désirée Clary, the girl who would eventually become Queen of Sweden.

filmography.title: Soldier of Fortune
filmography.role_description: The head of the Hong Kong marine police who aids a woman searching for her missing husband.
filmography.plot: A woman searches for her missing husband in Hong Kong and hires an American mercenary to help her brave Red China to find him.

filmography.title: Seven Cities of Gold
filmography.role_description: The historical Franciscan friar who accompanies a Spanish expedition into California, seeking to establish missions.
filmography.plot: A Spanish expedition marches from Mexico into California in search of the legendary Seven Cities of Gold.

filmography.title: The Rains of Ranchipur
filmography.role_description: The titled, wealthy, and cynical husband of a woman who falls in love with an Indian doctor.
filmography.plot: An Englishwoman in India engages in an affair with a Hindu doctor as natural disasters strike.

filmography.title: Teenage Rebel
filmography.role_description: The understanding new husband of a woman whose estranged teenage daughter comes to visit.
filmography.plot: A suburban housewife's life is disrupted when her rebellious teenage daughter from a previous marriage comes to live with her.

filmography.title: Island in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A wealthy war hero and landowner in the British West Indies who becomes involved in a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: Race relations and romance cause tension in the British West Indies during the 1950s.

filmography.title: Omar Khayyam
filmography.role_description: The historical Persian leader of the Assassins who clashes with the poet and mathematician Omar Khayyam.
filmography.plot: The life of the Persian poet and mathematician Omar Khayyam and his adventures in the 11th century.

filmography.title: Third Man on the Mountain
filmography.role_description: A famous mountaineer who encourages a young man to conquer the Citadel, a dangerous Alpine peak.
filmography.plot: A young Swiss man dreams of climbing the mountain that killed his father, despite the fears of his family.

filmography.title: The Lost World
filmography.role_description: A seasoned big-game hunter who joins an expedition to a plateau inhabited by dinosaurs.
filmography.plot: A professor leads an expedition into the Amazon to prove the existence of living dinosaurs.

filmography.title: Mary, Mary
filmography.role_description: A film star who complicates the reconciliation of a divorced couple in this romantic comedy.
filmography.plot: A divorced publisher tries to win back his ex-wife to help him with his taxes, but romance gets in the way.

filmography.title: Hotel
filmography.role_description: An aristocratic hotel guest who becomes involved in a hit-and-run accident cover-up.
filmography.plot: The owner of a New Orleans hotel tries to keep it running while dealing with various guests and a corporate takeover.

filmography.title: The Devil's Brigade
filmography.role_description: The American general who oversees the formation of the First Special Service Force during WWII.
filmography.plot: An American colonel trains a ragtag group of misfits and Canadians into an elite fighting unit for World War II.

filmography.title: The Power
filmography.role_description: A government official investigating a research team, one of whom possesses a deadly telekinetic power.
filmography.plot: One by one, members of a special research unit are being killed by a force with telekinetic powers.

filmography.title: The Battle of El Alamein
filmography.role_description: A portrayal of the famous British field marshal who led the Allied forces to victory in North Africa.
filmography.plot: A dramatization of the pivotal WWII battle in North Africa between the British and German forces.
